title: 40. 10 Signs of a Toxic Friendship + One Year Podcast Anniversery!
description:
Hey girl hey!

Today we are celebrating the one year anniversary of the Self Love Fix! (Official date is January 31, 2020 to be exact :) and in this episode, we chat about the 10 signs of a toxic friendship. We talk about some of the not so obvious signs that our friends may not have our best interest in mind and ways that we know our friends do. Tune in to listen to all the details!

 

Please don't forget to rate & review!

Click here to pre-order your copy of the Inner Child Healing Affirmations and Guided Meditations combo pack

 

Business Inquiries?
Email the team: hi@beatricekamau.com
IG: @theselflovefix.
Website: www.beatricekamau.com
